title: Attempting to Reconnect and Champ Select.
body:
I keep getting this same message and can't figure it out.. Please help and i lost my promos because of getting a Pitch Black champion select and i couldn't do anything but exit my client and that made me lose my promos. IS THERE AND SOLUTION TO THIS... 

Thank you..

replies.body:
Hey Mightyducky, 

That problem can be fixed pretty easily if you follow these steps in Riots Connection KB: https://support.leagueoflegends.com/entries/26932010-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq2 

That should get you back in the game with no issue. 

If you do have further issues, i'll be on for awhile so don't be afraid to reach out :) 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
